name: Canterbury Aero Club Inc.
about: The Canterbury Aero Club, located at Christchurch International Airport in New Zealand, has been a premier flight training institution for over 90 years. We offer a comprehensive range of programs from introductory flights to private and commercial pilot licenses, including multi-engine and instructor ratings. Our highly skilled and passionate instructors, along with a substantial fleet of aircraft, provide students with the highest standard of training in a safe and supportive environment. The club's mission is to promote, foster, encourage, and develop safe and skilful flying, and our state-of-the-art facilities, including a simulator centre and eLearning courses, enhance the learning experience. Whether your goal is recreational flying or a professional aviation career, the Canterbury Aero Club is dedicated to helping you achieve your dreams with confidence and excellence.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi-Engine Rating"]
